data.text: @rapturedman True it runs deep though very deep. We are getting to bottom of it. Actually we know what's going on but can't give all info at once. People will go crazy if we dump everything one time...

@RubinTorode He is under witness protection 😂😂😂😂.
Every time this guy was on screen , he was never sure of anything. " We don't know the severity", "we are still examining", "it is too early to tell." Too much rubbish
The govt also relied on "experts" like White House chief medical adviser Dr. Anthony Fauci and other academics to be interviewed and promote vaccination on the networks.

â€œcomprehensive media campaign." 

The outlets, which include ABC, CBS, NBC, CNN and MSNBC, nearly all uniformly published regular articles and video segments praising apparent vaccine efficacy.
